title: House cleaning every six months
description: House cleaning every six month - Hardness 4
items: Wipe down the inside of your fridge and freezer
Wash or dry clean your slipcovers, pillows, and comforters
Empty and clean your cabinet and pantry shelves, then take a #shelfie and show your mom :)
Vacuum or dust your refrigerator condenser coil
Wash and dry your stove hood filter
Freshen your drain and clean your garbage disposal
